Job Title: Acquisitions Associate – Multifamily (Semi-Remote)

Location: New York, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Finance

Description:
Real Estate Acquisitions Associate – Multifamily (Semi-Remote)
A prominent national real estate investment and management firm is seeking an Acquisitions Associate with skills and savvy to be the driving force behind the firm’s ongoing multifamily residential portfolio expansion efforts. This is a highly visible role providing rapid growth within a successful and dynamic company.
Responsibilities:The Acquisition Associate will work on a wide range of transactions including acquisitions, development, joint ventures, and business plan execution.Real estate asset valuation analysis of multi-family housing acquisition, rehabilitation, and development on a national level.Support all phases of project from sourcing through stabilization.Perform analysis of complex partnership agreements and cash flow waterfalls.Excel modeling.Market research and data mining.Budget management.Various analyses to assist in making investment decisions.Assistance with due diligence and execution of transactions.Drafting of memoranda for internal and external use.
Requirements:Bachelor degree in Finance or relevant discipline. Advance degree a plus.4+ years of experience in real estate analysis - development, acquisition, operations, and underwriting.Must have Excel (moderate to advanced functions such as logic formulas, V- look up, pivot tables), Argus is a plus.
Salary: $135,000 - $150,000 (commensurate with level of experience) + bonus, comprehensive health benefits, 401k, and other valuable perks.
The above salary range represents Advice's good faith and reasonable estimate of the possible base compensation range at the time of posting and is not reflective of the total compensation package, which may also include benefits, equity, and other non-cash incentives.
Please send your resume for immediate consideration to: EBelkin@adviceny.com
If this particular role isn’t the ideal fit, please feel free to forward your resume to the email above to explore other available opportunities. Please also feel free to share this posting with anyone in your network who might be open to learning more. Referrals are always appreciated! Advice Personnel*Celebrating over 35 years as New York’s trusted boutique executive recruiting & staffing firm*

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
